p: Fig 4Bâ€“4E displays the median of IRE (defined in Eq (16)) in estimating R 0, effective R, duration of infectiousness, and infection prevalence from applying calibration methods described above on 50 simulated trajectories shown in Fig 4A for a severe scenario with attack rate between 50% and 70% for a population of 10000. See S1 to S8 Figs for the performance of these methods under other epidemic and population size scenarios.
